Root 2 Shoot

A man is born in a bamboo cradle and goes away in a bamboo coffin. Everything in between is possible with bamboo!

About

Bamboo Product Making Process

...

Harvesting and Preparing Bamboo Cutting and Shaping Bamboo Assembly and Joining Bamboo Strips Finishing and Treatment

The process of crafting bamboo products involves meticulous selection of bamboo shoots, which are then cured to remove moisture and prevent decay. Skilled artisans cut and shape the cured bamboo into desired forms, often employing traditional techniques passed down through generations. Finally, the products are finished with natural oils or varnishes to enhance durability and highlight the natural beauty of bamboo.

Communities impacted

...

Geography of the Bhujel Village: Geography of the Bhujel Village: Deurali Community Forest, where the Bhujel village lies: Deurali Community Forest is situated in Nawalpur district's Gaidakot Municipality Ward No. 16. This area is located in the Gandaki province, approximately 150 kilometers southwest of Kathmandu and about 130 kilometers south of the provincial capital, Pokhara. The community forest ranges from 200 to 600 meters above sea level, with a mostly hilly terrain.

The process of crafting bamboo products involves meticulous selection of bamboo shoots, which are then cured to remove moisture and prevent decay. Skilled artisans cut and shape the cured bamboo into desired forms, often employing traditional techniques passed down through generations. Finally, the products are finished with natural oils or varnishes to enhance durability and highlight the natural beauty of bamboo.
